textContent: Discover more about the area, the habits, the history or the mining industry of Rosia Montana. You can rent bikes, guided tours by bike or walk or just have a chat with the locals. The bookings can be made from the accommodation page when you book rooms or camping. When you will arrive will meet our guide and discuss about the trails you will like to do.
